text: Mix berries, sugar, and lemon juice in a blender. Blend until it's smooth. Pour this mixture through a mesh sieve. Press with a spatula. Remove and toss all the seeds.  Move half of this mixture to a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate. Mix cream and vanilla in another large bowl. Whip well. Fold the rest of the berry puree into the cream. Dump mixture into custard cups. Cover and refrigerate for one hour up to overnight. Dump the berry puree you reserved in the small bowl over the treat. Garnish with extra blackberries if wanted.
